thread.section_title: The Nadler Soho - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great service! Great location
thread.title_full: Great service! Great location - Review of The Nadler Soho, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: emilyjensen
title: Great service! Great location
text:
Good choice for a perfectly placed hotel in Soho. Very well designed and comfortable modern rooms. our superior double room was fantastic with all conveniences.Rooms are small but luxurious. Location can not be better, it is in the centre of Soho. Highly recommended.
The wifi in the room is not stable!!
